p: Passive immunotherapeutic strategies like convalescent plasma (CP) therapy have been used by several countries to treat patients suffering from severe SARS-CoV-2 infection [ 18, 19]. CP has proved its effectiveness in neutralizing viruses like SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, Ebola and H1N1. So, in this pandemic situation of COVID-19, globally, CP therapy has been explored for an effective line of treatment [ 20, 21].
